dialogue: When do you think you can get that done for me?
If I had no interruptions, I could finish in four hours.
But we have to factor in the inefficiency of your management.
For example, you're likely to give me six new projects before I get started on this one.
And you force me to work in a noisy office surrounded by all the people I need to avoid to get work done.
Given all of that, I'd say it will take seven months.
I'll give you three months because I'm a leader.
And... how much of the three months will involve you standing there?
